mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.gongzuorenyuan_id as gongzuorenyuanId ,a.zhifangtu_uuid_number as zhifangtuUuidNumber ,a.zhifangtu_name as zhifangtuName ,a.zhifangtu_types as zhifangtuTypes ,a.zhifangtu_file as zhifangtuFile ,a.zhifangtu_time as zhifangtuTime ,a.zhifangtu_content as zhifangtuContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_uuid_number as gongzuorenyuanUuidNumber ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_name as gongzuorenyuanName ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_phone as gongzuorenyuanPhone ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_id_number as gongzuorenyuanIdNumber ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_photo as gongzuorenyuanPhoto ,gongzuorenyuan.jianyangongzhong_types as jianyangongzhongTypes ,gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_email as gongzuorenyuanEmail ,gongzuorenyuan.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM zhifangtu a left JOIN gongzuorenyuan gongzuorenyuan ON a.gongzuorenyuan_id = gongzuorenyuan.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.gongzuorenyuan_id = #{params.gongzuorenyuanId} )
and a.zhifangtu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhifangtuUuidNumber},'%')
and a.zhifangtu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhifangtuName},'%')
and a.zhifangtu_types = #{params.zhifangtuTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhifangtu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhifangtuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhifangtu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhifangtuTimeEnd})
and a.zhifangtu_time = #{params.zhifangtuTime}
and a.zhifangtu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhifangtuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.gongzuorenyuan_id IS NOT NULL
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanUuidNumber},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanName},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanPhone},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanIdNumber},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.jianyangongzhong_types = #{params.jianyangongzhongTypes}
and gongzuorenyuan.gongzuorenyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongzuorenyuanEmail},'%')
and gongzuorenyuan.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
